snippet: The British tennis player Andy Murray said he enjoyed Shanghai and Acapulco, and he sees himself remaining in sports, tennis or otherwise, after his playing days are behind him.
lead_paragraph: The British tennis player Andy Murray said he enjoyed Shanghai and Acapulco, and he sees himself remaining in sports, tennis or otherwise, after his playing days are behind him.

headline.print_headline: Andy Murray Discusses Favorite Courts, and the Future
headline.main: Andy Murray Discusses Favorite Courts, and the Future
